text: Samuel R. Lloyd IV or simply Sam Lloyd (November 12, 1963 - April 30, 2020) was an American actor and an a capella singer. He was best known for his roles as lawyer Ted Buckland on the American comedy-drama Scrubs and as Albert Goldfine in Desperate Housewives. Lloyd was born in Weston, Vermont. His uncle is actor Christopher Lloyd. In February 2019, Lloyd was diagnosed with terminal brain cancer, which spread to his lungs, liver, jaw and spine.‘Scrubs’ Star Sam Lloyd Diagnosed With Cancer, by Daniel Goldblatt, at The Blast; published February 5, 2019; retrieved February 5, 2019 He died of the disease on April 30, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Vermont Category:Singers from Vermont
